name: Spicy Stories: Romance Episode
description:
In real life, it is not always possible to fulfill one's desires and fantasy. Sometimes you want to turn back time to make a different choice in one episode or another and rewrite your story.

Our story games give you a unique chance to create your own love adventure. You will choose your main character, try on different hairstyles and outfits, and also make a choice. Sometimes to choose will be very difficult, because each our story is complex and realistic. You control the plot, make the choice, determine the main character's behavior and help her to build relationships with other characters. Our main character constantly gets in different adventure stories, so to follow her each chapter will be very interesting!


In each love story you will meet love, friendship, betrayal, hatred, disappointment – the whole range of emotions and feelings that accompany our life. You will develop the main character's relationship with other characters, meet new people and choose your love. You will pick a reaction to attention from guys. He winked at you – what will you choose? Say “Hello” or blow him off? He wants you – how will you react? Kiss him or stop him? Make your choice! This is the game for adults, so your adventures will be really hot and interesting!


Each choice in the game is very important and sometimes crucial, so you need to pay attention to the storyline, so each adventure of the main character strengthens her relations with her beloved one.


Our story games are written in the way that each book is divided into parts, and each chapter will tell a little episode from the main character's life. You'll meet a dreamy journalist, a proud careerist, a confused nurse, and even a police detective! And each of them, using their fantasy, is trying to find love and build their story. And it's up to you whether or not each of them will be able to meet their beloved one! Your choice in each episode carries a lot of weight, so play carefully!


You decide how the story will develop next. Listen to your intuition, turn on the fantasy and choose your adventure! Remember that every episode has a different ending, and it all depends on your choice! Each our story is constructed so that the ending will be completely unpredictable!


Our story collection will be constantly updated with new stories, so download the game and dive into the world of crazy love, incredible adventures and unexpected discoveries! Each story will be yours, and only you will control its plot!
